meta.title: Welcome to StaticPage!
meta.description: Create your own Coming Soon, Under Maintenance, and 404 pages.

header.title: Welcome to StaticPage!
header.paragraph: Create your own **Coming Soon**, **Under Maintenance**, and **404** pages.

bulletins.paragraph: The perfect fit for creating great looking static pages.
Most importantly, it keeps things simple.
Developed as a user friendly tool with high quality results.
To try it all just click the registration button.

services.title: Create a page!
services.paragraph: Watched the video and excited to try out StaticPage? Click the registration button and sign up for free during the beta testing period instead of $19 a year.

services.title: Built for you.
services.paragraph: Impressed but don’t have the time to build a page yourself? Don’t worry I got you! Contact me with the details of your page and I will get back to you with a proposal and a time estimate.

about.title: About the Creator.
about.paragraph: Idan Goldman, a Frontend Developer with 10+ years of experience under my belt. Decided to quit my job and follow the dream of building a product company. What a better way to do so than using my frontend expertise to develop a page builder. One that saves time, easy to use, and most importantly gives you control of the source code. You can follow me and my journey on Twitter at [@idan_goldman](https://twitter.com/idan_goldman) or subscribe to StaticPage’s mailing list and get updated on the latest features and growth.

credits.title: ♥ Credits.
credits.paragraph:
**"Give credit to whom Credit due"** – Samuel Adams.
My friends and family deserve all the credit there is for helping and pushing me to create this product.

kudos.name: David Rappaport
kudos.paragraph: Brilliant Web and Product designer. Responsible for this clean landing page and awesome logo.

kudos.name: Yaron Rosen
kudos.paragraph: Best WordPress theme designer and builder. Responsible for the old StaticPage logo and helping me out from the start.

kudos.name: Leeya Goldman
kudos.paragraph: My amazing wife and partner in crime. Responsible for all of this happening and pushing me forward.

content.footer: **StaticPage** built with **love** out of an apartment somewhere in **Tel Aviv**.
